com.ethercis.dao.access.interfaces

Interface I_ContributionAccess

  • All Superinterfaces:
    I_SimpleCRUD<I_ContributionAccess,java.util.UUID>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ContributionAccess

    public interface I_ContributionAccess
extends I_SimpleCRUD<I_ContributionAccess,java.util.UUID>
    Access layer to Contributions Created by Christian Chevalley on 4/21/2015.

    • Method Summary

      void addComposition(I_CompositionAccess compositionAccess)
      add a new composition to this contribution
      NB: The contribution and composition requires commit() to be saved in the DB

      commit the contribution with a certifying signature
      the signature is stored in the Contribution Version entry, the state of the contribution is then 'complete'

    • Method Detail

      • getNewInstance

        static I_ContributionAccess getNewInstance(I_DomainAccess domain,
                                           java.util.UUID ehrId,
                                           java.util.UUID systemId,
                                           java.util.UUID composerId,
                                           java.lang.String description,
                                           java.lang.Integer setting,
                                           ContributionDef.ContributionType contributionType,
                                           ContributionDef.ContributionState contributionState)
        get a new access layer instance
        Parameters:
        domain - SQL context
        ehrId - the EHR uuid this contribution belong to
        systemId - the system uuid from which the contribution is generated
        composerId - the composer uuid that generate this contribution
        description - a literal describing the contribution
        setting - a concept code describing the change type
        contributionType - the contribution type
        contributionState - the contribution state
        Returns:
        a new I_ContributionAccess
        See Also:
        I_PartyIdentifiedAccess, I_EhrAccess, I_SystemAccess, I_ConceptAccess, ContributionDef

        contributionId - the contribution id
        Returns:

        Throws:

      • commitWithSignature

        java.util.UUID commitWithSignature(java.lang.String signature)
                            throws java.lang.Exception
        commit the contribution with a certifying signature
        the signature is stored in the Contribution Version entry, the state of the contribution is then 'complete'
        Parameters:
        signature - String representing the certification
        Returns:
        UUID of committed contribution
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
